sentences.en: "That's a nice dress," said Michael. "Thanks," she replied solemnly.
sentences.cn: “那件衣服很好看，”迈克尔说。“谢谢，”她严肃地回答。

sentences.en: a gentleman in evening dress
sentences.cn: 穿晚礼服的绅士

sentences.en: A performer in evening dress plays classical selections on the violin.
sentences.cn: 一名身穿晚礼服的表演者用小提琴演奏了几段古典音乐。

sentences.en: a summer dress
sentences.cn: 夏天穿的连衣裙

sentences.en: Can you wait a minute? I’m just getting dressed .
sentences.cn: 稍等一会儿，我穿下衣服就好。

sentences.en: Does this dress make my legs look too stumpy?
sentences.cn: 这条裙子会使我的腿看上去又短又粗吗？

sentences.en: Each dress is hemmed and scrupulously checked for imperfections.
sentences.cn: 每条连衣裙都缝上了褶边，并经过严格的检查，不允许有任何瑕疵。

sentences.en: Her silk dress was sky-blue, the colour of her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她的丝绸连衣裙是天蓝色的，和她眼睛的颜色一样。

sentences.en: I dressed down for such a casual occasion.
sentences.cn: 在这样非正式的场合，我穿着随便

sentences.en: I usually have to dress the kids in the mornings.
sentences.cn: 早上我通常得给孩子们穿衣服。

sentences.en: I was dressed down by the teacher for lateness.
sentences.cn: 我因为迟到而受到老师的责备

sentences.en: Maria wore a layered white dress that rustled when she moved.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚穿一袭白色节裙，一动裙子就窸窣作响。

sentences.en: She dressed quickly and went out of the house.
sentences.cn: 她很快穿好衣服，走到房子外面。

sentences.en: She had made Helen a dress which showed off her tiny waist.
sentences.cn: 她给海伦做了件很显她纤细腰身的连衣裙。

sentences.en: She ripped off her dress and let it fall to the floor.
sentences.cn: 她一把扯下连衣裙，任其滑落到地上。

sentences.en: She shouldn't have mentioned how heavy the dress was.
sentences.cn: 她本不该说起这条裙子有多沉。

sentences.en: She was wearing a flimsy pink dress that streamed out behind her.
sentences.cn: 她穿的那件轻薄的粉红色连衣裙在身后飘舞。

sentences.en: Sheila wore a long red dress.
sentences.cn: 希拉穿了一条红色的连衣长裙。

sentences.en: That afternoon she went out and bought a new dress.
sentences.cn: 那天下午她出门买了一件新裙子。

sentences.en: That dress came all the way from New York.
sentences.cn: 那条裙子是大老远从纽约送来的。

sentences.en: the company dressed up the figures a little.
sentences.cn: 这家公司对数据做了些加工。

sentences.en: The dress exaggerates her wasp waist and enlarges her bosom.
sentences.cn: 那件连衣裙凸显了她的蜂腰，也让她的胸部看起来更丰满。

sentences.en: The play was performed in modern dress (= clothes from the present time ) .
sentences.cn: 这出戏里演员是现代装束。

sentences.en: The red dress had slim black piping around the neck.
sentences.cn: 这条红裙的领口有细细的黑色滚边。

sentences.en: The tourists snigger at the locals' outdated ways and dress.
sentences.cn: 游客们偷偷地取笑当地人落伍的做法和衣着。

sentences.en: They dressed up and went to the prom.
sentences.cn: 他们盛装去参加舞会

words.tran_cn: 穿好衣服的；打扮好的；去内脏及分割加工好的（特指动物，如鱼，禽类等）
盛装舞步；花式骑术训练；驯马技术
穿衣；加工；调味品；装饰；梳理
装饰；给…穿衣；布置（dress的过去分词）
给…穿衣；为…打扮（dress的现在分词）
制衣（尤指制女装，dressmake的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 酒会礼服；（正式场合穿的）短裙
穿平常的衣服：穿非正式服装以适应场合或地点
女装人体模型；服装人体模型；服装模型（陈列服装的人体模型）
将舰旗、信号旗悬挂在船上
盛装：穿正式的或精选的服装
n. 化装舞会所穿着的服装

trans.tran_en: clothes for men or women of a particular type or for a particular occasion
a piece of clothing worn by a woman or girl that covers the top of her body and part or all of her legs

trans.tran_cn: （给…）穿衣，打扮，装饰，穿正式服装，包扎，烹饪调制，加工处理
trans.tran_en: to put clothes on yourself or someone else
